title: Bill Signed: H.R. 2670 | The White House
content: On Friday, December 22, 2023, the President signed into law: H.R. 2670, the “National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2024,” which authorizes fiscal year 2024 appropriations principally for Department of Defense programs and military construction, Department of Energy national security programs, Department of State, and Intelligence programs; specifies authorities relating to the U.S. Armed Forces; extends the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act; and other matters.Thank you to Representatives Rogers and Smith, Senators Reed and Wicker, and many others for their leadership.###
